sentences.en: Advance telephone booking and referral by network panel doctors are required.
sentences.cn: 所有中心均须电话预约并需要网络医生转介信.

sentences.en: Are referral systems in place where options are limited?
sentences.cn: 在避孕方法和服务有限的地区是否有转诊体系?

sentences.en: Ask your doctor for a referral to a clinical psychologist.
sentences.cn: 让你的医生给你推荐一位临床心理学家。

sentences.en: For referral or check details, pls. contact Shirley Naturopathic Holistic Centre.
sentences.cn: 如需转介或查询详情, 请联络莎莉自然疗法医疗中心.
需要送到医院就诊的疾病

sentences.en: Legal Aid can often provide referral to other types of agencies.
sentences.cn: 法律援助机构通常可以帮助引荐到其他类型的机构去。

sentences.en: Mystical Maze Great Free Traffic Exchange earn up to $ 5 per Referral!
sentences.cn: 神秘迷宫巨大自由交通交换赢得$5每提及!

sentences.en: Obtaining an employee referral is a good as far as it goes.
sentences.cn: Safferstone说,就目前来说,能够得到员工的推荐是很好的.

sentences.en: Once the limit is reached the referral clicks will cease to count.
sentences.cn: 超过最大点击数的下线点击将被忽略.

sentences.en: Only 39 percent of patients were seen within four weeks of referral.
sentences.cn: 被介绍转诊的病人中，只有39%的人在四个星期内得到了诊治。

sentences.en: Second, establishment key field commercial bribe file referral system.
sentences.cn: 二是建立重点领域商业贿赂档案查询系统.

sentences.en: Telephone confirmation: the referral centre will notify customers once email booking confirmed.
sentences.cn: 电话确认: 收到电邮预约通知后由保健通服务站致电客户确认.

sentences.en: Temple built by referral, the original parent phase, the mother monument.
sentences.cn: 介庙所建处, 原有母子相 、 母子碑.

sentences.en: The push for a referral ( referral push ), also known as mesons.
sentences.cn: 一作介之推 ( 介推 ), 亦称介子.

sentences.en: This benefit could be offered to the referral of the standard member.
sentences.cn: 该项优惠适用于“普通会员”的推荐人.

sentences.en: We want to transfer this referral to the Tainan missionaries.
sentences.cn: 我们要把这张回条转移给台南的传教士.
